name: jaw-fossil
effect: Can be revived into a Tyrunt.
short_effect: Can be revived into a Tyrunt.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks as if it could be a piece of a large jaw.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks as if it could be a piece of a large jaw.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks as if it could be a piece of a large jaw.
